typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as integer,
		status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		productid as string,
		title as string,
		unitsinstock as string,
		unitprice as string,
		itemdiscount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source3
source1, source2 join(customer == customerid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, source3 join(product == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
